definitions.definition: A necessary commodity , a staple requirement .
examples: Rice is a basic for many Asian villagers.

definitions.definition: An elementary building block , e.g. a fundamental piece of knowledge .
examples: Arithmetic is a basic for the study of mathematics.
I know the basics of sailing and would love to learn more.
The drill sergeants gave him hell in basic .

main_definition: A necessary commodity , a staple requirement .
secondary_definitions: An elementary building block , e.g. a fundamental piece of knowledge .
